Zdravlje sa stilom usled proširivanja svojih poslovnih aktivnosti oglašava potrebu za popunjavanje radnog mesta Defektolog saradnik za optometriju Glavne odgovornosti radnog mesta su Savetovanje klijenata u pronalaženju najadekvatnijeg rešenja prilikom izbora naočara i ili dioptrijskih odnosno kontaktnih sočiva Savetovanje klijenata o načinu pravilnog korišćenja i održavanja naočara i ili dioptrijskih odnosno kontaktnih sočiva Praćenje najbolje poslovne prakse iz optometrije Prijem klijenata koji imaju slušne probleme ili probleme u razumevanju govora Uslovi radnog mesta Diploma Fakulteta za specijalnu edukaciju i rehabilitaciju ili medicinskog fakulteta Prethodno radno iskustvo u struci poželjno nije neophodno Komunikativnost i sklonost ka radu sa klijentima Savesnost pri obavljanju poverenih poslova Proaktivnost i incijativnost u radu Orijentisanost ka postizanju ciljeva Sklonost ka kontinuiranom ličnom razvoju Poznavanje rada na računaru Za kandidate koji nemaju prethodno iskustvo u oblasti optike pružamo odgovarajuću obuku Naša kompanija nudi dinamično radno okruženje odlične mogućnosti za lični razvoj i dalje profesionalno napredovanje Ukoliko smatrate da ispunjavate uslove iz konkursa svoj CV i motivaciono pismo možete proslediti elektronskim putem Sve prijave će se tretirati kao strogo poverljiva dokumentacija Biće kontaktirani samo kandidati koji uđu u uži izbor Postanite deo tima koji obezbeđuje lidersku poziciju živeći i primenjujući poslovnu filozofiju Zdravlja sa stilom U procesu selekcije kandidati neće biti neposredno niti posredno diskriminisani u odnosu na zdravstveno stanje invalidnost pol starost boju kože nacionalnu pripadnost veroispovest bračni status seksualno ili političko opredeljenje članstvo u različitim organizacijama ili neko drugo lično svojstvo

projekta Organizovanje rada i praćenje dnevnih radnih aktivnosti uz utvrđeni raspored Saradnja sa projektantom vođom projekta rukovodiocem pogona i podizvođačem u cilju realizacije projekta u zadatom roku u okviru budžeta i kvalitetno Upravljanje gradilištem upravljanje i kontrola standardnih operacionih procedura SOP higijene i zaštite na radu vođenje projekta uz minimalne resurse minimalnu potrošnju a maksimalni učinak Kontrola terena u različitim fazama građevinskog projekta npr u toku pripremnih radova obilaska lokacije primopredaje radova otklanjanja kvarova i dr Sprovođenje i pravovremeno ishodovanje svih potrebnih ISO sertifikata Uslovi Diploma iz dizajna enterijera građevinske struke arhitekture ili srodnih disciplina Minimalno 2-4 godine radnog iskustva u srodnoj industriji Obavezno poznavanje engleskog jezika Rad u timu i pod pritiskom sposobnost samostalnog izvršavanja radnih zadataka u kratkim rokovima Motivisanost i lojalnost Kolegijalnost Organizacione i komunikacione veštine Poznavanje administrativnih poslova i rada u programima MS Word Excel Project Aktivan vozač Nudimo sledeće Redovnu zaradu Ugovor na godinu dana sa mogućnošću prerastanja u stalni radni odnos Mogućnost stručnog usavršavanja i napredovanja Dinamično radno okruženje CV sa fotografijom i referencama slati elektronskim putem ili putem pošte na adresu NEPC Bulevar oslobođenja br #GDPR# Novi Sad Samo kandidati koji uđu u uži izbor će biti kontaktirani Job Description Review all necessary documents required by the project e g building guideline BOQ method statement etc Study all project information and drawings to understand the design and detailing Develop the schedule for overall project execution planning Delegate work tasks and close monitoring of daily work activities with schedule Work closely with Designer Project Manager Factory Manager and sub-contractor to ensure on-time delivery of project within budget and with good quality Site management ensure proper command and control of site SOP cleanliness & workplace safety project running at minimum resources minimum wastage and maximum efficiency Conduct site surveys during various stages of the construction project e g Pre-con site walk handover defect rectification etc Provide assistance to fellow staffs whenever necessary Produce and submit all necessary ISO forms on time Job Requirements Diploma in Interior Design Building Architecture or related disciplines Minimum 2-4 years of working experience in the related industry A proactive team player but with the ability to work html2.62: Trgovački obrt P&J je osnovan 1994 godine U gotovo 25 godina postojanja prošli smo transformaciju od lokalnog obrta i vinarije preko veleprodaje pića do mreže Gastro Diskonata u dvije županije gđe smo danas Kompanija unazad nekoliko godina vrlo snažno i sigurno raste te namjeravamo zadržati takav trend u godinama koje slijede Đelatnost kojom se dominantno bavimo je snabdijevanje HORECA hoteli restorani cafe barovi kupaca s pićem hranom sredstvima za čišćenje repro materijalom i sl Trenutno zapošljavamo 25 radnika u stalnom radnom odnosu a sa sezonskim radnicima i studentima u ljetnim mjesecima zapošljavamo preko 50 ljudi Tražimo osobe za radno mjesto Dostavljač Posao se sastoji od isporučivanja robe ugostiteljskim objektima na području Rovinja Rijeke Plaća je 660,00 za 6 i 9 mjesec a 930,00 za 7 i 8 neto Tražimo osobu koja je odgovorna kojoj nije stran fizički rad ima vozačku dozvolu B kategorije Nudimo stimulativnu plaću rad u dvije smjene 8-satni radni dan bez učestalih i pretjeranih prekovremenih slobodne neđelje osiguran smještaj mogućnost zaposlenja sljedeće sezone ukoliko zadovolji Razgovori s kandidatima će se obavljati u Novom Sadu i Sremskoj Mitrovici od strane zaposlenika koji je prošlu sezonu radio u našoj kompaniji te će raditi i ove godine Kandidati se mogu javiti elektronskim putem ili putem telefona

to Identify the key conferences lectures typically 10-30 Identify key learning points from the lectures and write summaries that can be repurposed into various forms of content eg summary of a 20min who are becoming global leaders in their field propose how we can collaborate with them and drive the implementation of that collaboration eg global webcast on a new topic in the field of Cardiology or Oncology Analyze what type of content drives the highest engagement and continuously improve engagement on EvermedTV Personality Traits This is a perfect role for you if you are Ambitious html2.157: BACKGROUND The Interreg IPA CBC Programme between Hungary and Serbia promotes cross-border cooperation and territorial development The priorities of the Programme include the improvement of key conditions of joint sustainable development as well as the strengthening of social and economic cohesion in the Programme area The Joint Secretariat JS is responsible for the day-to-day programme management supplies potential applicants with information provides advice during the application process and accompanies the Final Beneficiaries until their projects are finished It works in close co-operation with the Managing Authority while being independent from the national administrative structures The JS assists the Joint Monitoring Committee the Managing Authority the Certifying Authority and the Audit Authority in carrying out their respective duties The tasks of the JS include activities related to general programme co-ordination and implementation technical and administrative management information and publicity project development and selection The Joint Secretariat of the Interreg IPA CBC HU-SRB Programme is searching for an Communication Manager Budapest The Joint Secretariat of the Interreg IPA CBC HU-SRB Programme is searching for a full-time Communication Manager CM for a fixed term not less than 1,5 year The CM will be responsible for the development implementation and monitoring of the information and communication plan of the Programme with the involvement of external service providers S he also has to provide advice on visibility and communication related requirements to project partners RESPONSIBILITIES TASKS Programme Implementation and Promotion Elaborate the communication strategy of the Programme in line with the EU requirements and safeguard its implementation by means of setting up the Programme visual and corporate identity and coordinating its implementation organizing promotional campaigns in accordance to the target audience and Programme implementation cycle co-ordinating the design setting up content-writing and updating the Programme website organizing and contributing to project seminars and conferences as appropriate drafting the documents for public call for tenders for external service providers -defining the scope goal and requirements of the tender drafting the content and coordinating the design of promotional materials organisation of events conferences workshops seminars meetings etc with the support of external service providers as applicable maintaining relations with selected service providers day-to-day co-operation with regard to the progress of contracted tasks devising planning and executing media social media and promotional campaigns coordinating the copy-writing printing and distribution of leaflets brochures and other publications preparing statistics and monitoring figures at Programme level for the Joint Monitoring and Steering Committee meetings including the European Commission and to assist the implementation of these meetings assisting and contributing to the drafting of the quarterly reports to the Managing Authority and the annual progress reports to the EC Participation in the development of implementation and publicity guidelines and associated presentations and materials contributing to the development of procedures and manuals for implementation of the information and publicity measures at the project level providing assistance to individual applicants in the development of their project with special regard to project visibility requirements Providing guidance to projects on fulfilling visibility requirements advising Lead Beneficiaries LB and other programme actors on opportunities and obligations for information and publicity drafting and sending newsletters about the Programme implementation's news Participating in and holding presentations at project development events Coordinating and participating in the project selection and evaluation procedure devising and coordinating the creation of the Communication Strategy for the Programme #GDPR# BASIC REQUIREMENTS Relevant university degree preferably in communication possibly MA in English language and literature MA in international relations or European studies journalism or related field At least 4 years of experience in information and communication activities preferably in the context of Structural Funds EU programme or international project management Fluent in spoken and written English as well as in Hungarian and or Serbian Knowledge of the up-to-date trends in ICT for communication purposes Demonstrated professional use of social media tools and platforms knowledge of trends in development of web and mobile applications to reach the wider audience and general public Experiences in organizing information and publicity events including conferences and fairs Demonstrated experience in editing publications including the coordination of the entire editing and publishing process of publications Willingness to travel Excellent managerial and negotiation skills and organising ability Excellent communication and drafting skills capacity to convey information in an informative accurate and appealing way Ability to take personal responsibility for delivery of high quality results to tight deadlines ASSE Good team player with capacity to work in a multicultural environment Good understanding and knowledge of the programme area #GDPR-company#required 3-5 years professional experience Required language level Any of these are English higher advanced fit for negotiation Serbian higher advanced fit for negotiation Hungarian higher advanced fit for negotiation APPLICATION PROCEDURE Interested applicants have to submit a curriculum vitae CV with or without photo a motivation letter in English proof of education scanned version in English or original language with accompanying translation in English proof of knowledge of languages if available These documents will form the basis of the initial stage of selection Potential candidates will be asked to attend an interview in English The final decision on the selection will be taken by the Head of JS in consultation with the Managing Authority as well as with the #GDPR-company#Authority of Serbia The application should be submitted electronically Only those applications which have been received by the closing date to this vacancy announcement will be eligible for consideration Additional Information Terms of employment The selected candidates will be employed on a permanent contract basis for 1,5 years considering the possibility of extension with a trial period of 3 months The contract will be based on Hungarian labour law therefore in case the successful applicant is of a non-EU nationality he she will have to obtain a work permit and a residence permit in order to hold the position Salary A competitive salary calculated in accordance to qualifications and work experience Location The Joint Secretariat is located in Budapest Hungary For further information on the Interreg-IPA Cross-border Cooperation Programme Hungary Serbia please visit the Programme's website

html2.285: We are looking for Lawyer in the Legal Research Service of the Boards of Appeal 10681 Location Munich With almost 7 000 employees the #GDPR-company#EPO is the second-largest public service institution in Europe It supports innovation competitiveness and economic growth across Europe through a commitment to high-quality and efficient services delivered under the European Patent Convention EPC its founding treaty It has a yearly budget of EUR 2.3 billion entirely financed by the fees paid by its users The Boards of Appeal BoA are the first and final judicial instance in the procedures before the EPO Their task is to review contested decisions of the EPO's departments of first instance within the framework of the EPC The Legal Research Service of the BoA is a unit providing them with legal support and disseminating information on their case law Your main responsibilities Drafting reports and studies for the BoA and the President of the BoA on legal questions in particular concerning civil procedure and patent law Analysing and reporting on the case law of the BoA as well as patent-related decisions handed down by national courts in the EPC contracting states Preparing patent-law-related publications in English French and German Supporting the President of the BoA and the Director of Legal Research and Administration on legal issues Giving lectures for internal and external training purposes What we expect from you Completed advanced university degree in law Excellent legal research analysis and drafting skills Interest or knowledge in the field of industrial property ideally patent law Very good communication skills oral and written Excellent knowledge of English preferably native speaker or full professional bilingual proficiency Very good practical IT skills especially in using electronic search tools A highly service-oriented approach A systematic results-oriented approach and a sense of initiative #GDPR-company#of working in an international environment Your qualifications Diploma of completed studies at master's level or in exceptional cases equivalent professional experience Generally an excellent knowledge at least C1 of one official language English French or German and ability to understand the other two In exceptional cases excellent knowledge at least C1 of one official language and working knowledge at least B2 of another In such cases the willingness to learn the third language and to reach level B2 within a set time frame would be required Citizenship of one of the member states www.generic.com of the European Patent Organisation Process and timeline The successful candidate will be selected on the basis of qualifications and relevant experience supplemented as appropriate by interviews tests and or a personality questionnaire It is intended to hold the interviews in week 14 in Munich * after deduction of EPO internal tax and before deduction of staff contributions to the social-security and pension schemes The salary range depends on experience To foster gender diversity EPO encourages applications from women The EPO is an equal opportunities employer and supports workforce diversity as a signatory to the Diversity Charter Charta der Vielfalt since 2010 All applications for vacant positions will be welcomed and considered on the professional merits of the applicant against the role profile for the position regardless of nationality ethnic origin gender sexual orientation marital status disability parental responsibilities age religion or belief

over 130 multi-cultural employees and due to recent growth the company is seeking to recruit a head of Quantity Surveying to join our dynamic team Site Coordinator Mosta Malta Job Description Whilst reporting to the Operations Manager and assisted by a group of technical people the Site Coordinator is responsible for Ensure efficient and high-quality operation of the site assigned to them which needs to be done in a professional and structured manner in line with company procedures Lead the site M&E team might have sub-contractors too to ensure that works carried out on all the sites adhere to the clients contractual expectations Reach all the project deadlines whilst ensuring M&E people are performing to their utmost abilities Go through the tender drawings to understand the site Go through the contract and understand what the deadline is penalties if we don't deliver payment terms only for information purposes to notify the QS department once a section is complete to push for the bill by the same QS department Identify who is client the consultant of the client and who will be the main point of reference Visit the site to identify the sequence of works and which area needs to be done after which Go through the HSE plan and the works method statement to understand in detail the project Go through the workings BOQ prepared by the tendering department to understand who the suppliers are subcontractors and the full scope of works Creating Charts and Schedules for this task the project leader needs to create necessary charts inline with specific project requirements Work Schedule 50 hours a week from Monday to Friday starting from 06:30 hrs until 17:00 hrs #GDPR-company#Minimum experience of 2 years in a similar position Knowledge and Skills Required Needs to have a and resilience Be able to communicate clearly and effectively with colleagues Ability to take control and manage deadlines successfully Be a good listener and a great team player Must be highly organized with strong attention to detail Ability to work calmly and effectively under pressure Strong leadership skills and problem sensitivity awareness Must have problem-solving abilities be self-motivated and proactive Result-oriented and a highly determined individual Have a good command of speaking and writing skills in English and preferably Maltese Documents required European passport or working permission to work in Malta From our part we will take care of work permit applications for the candidates Clean police conduct certificate must be presented In order to apply please send your CV electronically All candidates will be interviewed in Serbia first week of March The address for the interview will be given as soon as we receive your application

html2.338: Junior Professional Programme Assistant Lawyer Bosnia and Herzegovina Montenegro Serbia Registry of the European Court of Human Rights Location Strasbourg Are you a young law graduate who wants to gain experience in an international Organisation working for human rights democracy and the rule of law Do you want to help the European Court of Human Rights to ensure respect for the human rights of 820 million Europeans Are you interested in dealing with applications alleging violations of the rights set out in the European Convention on Human Rights If so our Assistant Lawyers scheme may be the right thing for you Who we are With over 2000 staff representing all its 47 member States the #GDPR-company#is a multicultural organisation We all strive towards protecting human rights democracy and the rule of law and our three core values professionalism integrity and respect guide the way we work The European Court of Human Rights oversees the implementation of the European Convention on Human Rights in the member States See the Court's website www.generic.com for information about its activities Your role As an Assistant Lawyer you will assist more senior members of staff in the preparation of correspondence with applicants and draft decisions in standard form cases You will examine and deal with applications in prima facie inadmissible cases and in cases which can be dealt with in a standard manner draft decisions minutes reports notes and other documents advise applicants in correspondence or if necessary in interviews on the conditions of admissibility of applications attend the Court's sessions and presenting applications assist one or more experienced case-lawyers where necessary in the preparation of Chamber cases for examination by the Court The Assistant Lawyers Scheme opens the doors of the European Court of Human Rights to you legal professionals at the start of your career giving you an opportunity to gain experience working within this European institution You will benefit from regular working contact with experienced case lawyers senior managers and the judges themselves While dealing with individual applications originating from your own legal system and assisting senior colleagues in handling more complex applications you benefit from the Registry's in-house training programme and deepen your knowledge of the functioning of the European Court of Human Rights and the Convention case-law What we are looking for As a minimum you must hold a higher education degree in law obtained in Bosnia and Herzegovina Montenegro or Serbia of a standard permitting access either on the basis of qualifications or after passing a competitive examination to the judicial administration or legal professions in Bosnia and Herzegovina Montenegro or Serbia after having obtained the relevant higher education degree in law have at least six months professional experience acquired in the legal field preferably in the judicial service in Bosnia and Herzegovina Montenegro or Serbia or in international Organisations have a very good knowledge of one of the two official languages of the #GDPR-company#English French and the ability to draft legal texts therein clearly and precisely have an excellent knowledge of any one of the official languages of Bosnia and Herzegovina Montenegro or Serbia mother tongue level master both the Latin and Cyrillic alphabets be a citizen of one of the 47 member States of the #GDPR-company#Show us that you have the following competencies Professional and technical expertise thorough knowledge of the legal system of Bosnia and Herzegovina Montenegro or Serbia and ability to handle cases arising in other jurisdictions knowledge of constitutional and of international law Drafting skills Concern for quality Planning and work organisation Analysis and problem solving Learning and development Teamwork and co-operation Adaptability These would be an asset Results orientation Communication Decision making Initiative What we offer If successful you may be offered employment based on on a fixed-term contract at grade B3 In Strasbourg you will receive a basic monthly gross salary of 3 400 which is exempt from national income tax This salary may be supplemented by other allowances depending on your personal situation and you will be affiliated to a #GDPR-company#pension scheme You will also benefit from private medical insurance 32 working days leave per year and other benefits including flexible working hours training and development possibility of teleworking etc The Junior Professional Programme carried out in accordance with Article 16 of the Regulations on Appointments Appendix II to the Staff Regulations is a specific recruitment scheme suitable for young graduates at the start of their career Staff recruited under this scheme get a once-only opportunity of employment for a total maximum duration of four years and are not eligible for any subsequent internal competition promotion transfer or secondment Details on conditions of employment probationary period salaries allowances pension scheme social insurance etc can be consulted on our recruitment website www.generic.com Any changes to these conditions during the recruitment process are updated on this site and will apply at the time of the job offer If your profile matches our needs and you are not recruited straight away you may be placed on a reserve list valid for a maximum of four years For more information on how to apply please click the Apply button

html2.463: Global Production Controller m f Dornbirn Are you passionate about how numbers can drive the right decision making in a company Then you will be the perfect controller to support our worldwide production development We are an international Group with production locations in Austria China Serbia and the UK The Controlling Team in Dornbirn our headquarters measure and control the whole production cost development of TRIDONIC globally Are you driven by analysing processes and numbers combined with a passion for manufacturing You love to have a high degree of independence and freedom in a global role where you contribute together with the COO to optimize our production facilities Then this is the perfect job and we offer the perfect setting for you Our hierarchy is flat and we have a small professional team that looks forward to welcoming you Your job The financial controlling of local and global manufacturing costs you oversee supervise and are responsible for it You have the responsibility of the financial controlling of manufacturing cost Continuous target-actual comparisons with regard to plant-specific KPIs with deviation analyses with a focus on all Tridonic production plants worldwide You independently define measures analyse and review KPIs to suggest optimization options and evaluate minimize risks in the production process Face to face you report financial & controlling analytics to Operations- Plants- Finance Directors either to evaluate business cases and to support decision making You will coordinate budgeting and forecast processes and investment controlling worldwide for all plants and will maintain regular Tridonic reporting requirements in line with Zumtobel Group policies You will support to harmonize and further develop the reporting and process landscape within Tridonic globally We offer an attractive salary package depending on your professional qualifications and experience

product roadmap creating the product vision and strategy and helping to plan for its successful execution This is a hands-on role in which you will be expected to work alongside sales finance technical architects and engineers customer support teams as well as senior executives to ensure the growth and success of the Cloud Services portfolio Location The role will ideally be based out of positioning in the marketplace Define product definitions pricing strategies product features as well as all service and support aspects of the overall Cloud Services product offerings Identify and architecture engineering sales and sales engineering to help define and shape the go-to-market strategy for your products Own the product lifecycle and have a point of view on change management in all language

html2.41697: Mi smo sertifikovana agencija za posredovanje u zapošljavanju koja se zove #GDPR-company#takođe poznata i kao Employment power Od 1989 godine poslujemo sa kompanijama za zapošljavanje na turističkim brodovima i hotelima širom sveta u pružanju kvalitetnog osoblja za obavljanje poslova uglavnom u hotelskom sektoru Sarađujemo s najvećim i najpoznatijim cruise kompanijama na svetu kao što su Carnival Cruise Line Royal Caribbean #GDPR-company#Celebriti Cruises Norvegian Cruise Line Disney Cruise Line Cristal Cruises #GDPR-company#Line Scenic River Cruises i još mnogo drugih Zapošljavamo kandidate prvenstveno iz Evrope Naša glavna kancelarija je u Zagrebu u Hrvatskoj ali imamo kancelarije širom jugoistočne Evrope U Srbiji smo registrovani od marta 2015 godine i imamo sedište u Subotici kao i kancelariju u Beogradu Posedujemo licence Ministarstva za rad zapošljavanje boračka i socijalna pitanja u zapošljavanju kao i Ministarstvo građevinarstva saobraćaja i infrastrukture u zapošljavanju pomoraca Osim prepoznatljivog poslovanja u zapošljavanju na turističkim brodovima uspešno se bavimo zapošljavanjem u hotelskim lancima širom sveta Od zapošljavanja širom Hrvatske obale na sezonskim poslovima tako do zapošljavanja u Ujedinjenim Arapskim Emiratima a tako i u sve popularnijoj destinaciji za zapošljavanje Saudiskoj Arabiji Neki od poslodavaca sa kojima uspešno sarađujemo su i čuveni Ferrari World u Abu Dhabi-u kao i prestižni Madinat Jumeirah Resort u Dubai-u Potreban nam je Pekar Poslastičar Jedna radna pozicija 5 izvršilaca Lokacija Saudijska Arabija Opis posla Tražimo pekara-poslastičara za pripremu različitih vrsta hleba i širok spektar peciva kao i kolačića kolača i pita Odgovornosti Pekara uključuju otvaranje pekara rano ujutru mešanje testa pripremanje punjenja i glaziranje peciva Da biste bili uspešni u ovoj funkciji trebalo bi da imate radno iskustvo kao Pekar i da možete i umete da ukrašavate kolače koristeći kreativne tehnike Pečenje različitih tipova hleba kao što su perece bageti i višesemeni hlebovi radeći sa Glavnim šefom kako biste stvorili veliki repertoar proizvoda Mešanje raznih sastojka kako biste stvorili punila za kolače i pite npr čokoladni ganache karamel sos i voće Pripremite peciva po meri na osnovu želja gostiju Preporučivanje recepata npr Opcije bez glutena Pratite snabdevenost hranom i sastavljanje narudžbi po potrebi Poznavanje svih profesionalnih kuhinjskih aparata uključujući miksere blendera i dough sheeters Razumevanje prakse čuvanja i sigurnosti hrane Iskustvo sa tehnikama ukrašavanja kolača Odlične veštine upravljanja vremenom Sposobnost da ostanete mirni i fokusirani u brzom i radno zahtevnom okruženju Timski duh sa stavom usmerenim na zadovoljenju potreba gostiju Fleksibilnost za rad u ranim jutarnjim smenama Znanje i veštine Certifikat iz ugostiteljske škole ili slične kvalifikacije Trebalo bi posedovati snažne interpersonalne veštine srednje znanje pisanog i govornog engleskog jezika Radno iskustvo Minimum 2 godine iskustva u oblasti ugostiteljstva u hotelima ili restoranima visoke kategorije Iskustvo rada kao pekar-poslastičar ili u sličnim poslovima Profil kandidata Disciplinovan kandidat koji razume kulturološke i verske razlike i koji je spreman da poštuje striktna pravila u odevanju i ponašanju u javnosti kao i striktne islamske zakone Saudijske Arabije uz čestu i vidljivu rodnu segregaciju Nudimo #GDPR# plate Mogućnost je pregovarati o visini plate u datim okvirima Smeštaj i hrana plaćeni Medicinsko osiguranje tokom trajanja ugovora Avio karte plaćene Ugovori su od 12 meseci sa jednim mesecom odmora tokom leta koji je plaćen punom platom Prijave slati elektronskim putem

html2.55063: EXPO GRUPAČije su članice DOMAĆA TRGOVINA SRBIJA DOMAĆA TRGOVINA CRNA GORA EXPO COMMERCE CRNA GORA Objavljuje konkurs za poziciju HR Business Partner mesto rada Crna Gora Podgorica Odgovornosti Učestvuje u strateškom planiranju ljudskih resursa i partnerskih odnosa unutar tima u cilju efektivnog razvoja poslovanja u Crnoj Gori Odgovoran je za izradu HR istraživanja i analiza razvoj i održavanje HR politika i procedura Kreira i implementira pravilnike o organizaciji i sistematizaciji radnih mesta Kreira i implementira pravilnike o kompenzacijama i beneficijama zaposlenih Sprovodi proces planiranja i budžetiranja Sprovodi proces regrutacije i selekcije Sprovodi program orijentacije novozaposlenih Odgovoran je za sprovođenje programa procene zaposlenih u cilju uočavanja potreba za razvojem i stručnim usavršavanjem Kreira i sprovodi plan i program godišnjih obuka zaposlenih Kreira instrumente za ocenu performansi zaposlenih Odgovoran je za kvalitet ciljeva u procesu upravljanja učinkom kao i za praćenje i analizu učinka zaposlenih Učestvuje u praćenju i analizi apsentizma i fluktuacije zaposlenih Odgovoran je za implementaciju bezbednosti i zaštite na radu NAŠ KANDIDAT ima završene osnovne akademske studije ekonomskog društvenog ili organizacionog usmerenja i minimum 2 godine radnog iskustva u ljudskim resursima Iskustvo u FMCG industriji smatraće se kao prednost Od kandidata se očekuje uspešno snalaženje u radu na više projekata istovremeno uz dobru hijerarhiju prioriteta Očekuje se fleksibilnost i proaktivnost u radu sa različitim profilima ljudi Najbolji kandidat orijentisan je na uspostavljanje i održavanje kvalitetnih dugoročnih odnosa sa svim interesnim grupama Ako ste odgovorni sistematični i proaktivni pridružite se kreativnom timu Ako mislite da ste prava osoba za nas molim vas da pošaljete svoj CV do godine Biće kontaktirani samo kandidati koji uđu u uži izbor

html2.77256: MCBS Modern College of Business and Science is a well-respected higher-education institution in the Sultanate of Oman established in 1996 and fully accredited by the Ministry of Higher Education Ministry of Education and Ministry of #GDPR-company#The College is allocated in the beautiful Muscat the capital of Oman Oman is one of the safest countries in the Middle East region with the economy growing as fast as the UAE's in the previous years Due to strict politics against any extremism beautiful climate and great economy Oman has become home to numerous citizens of Serbia and former Yugoslav republics The #GDPR-company#in the Sultanate of Oman Muscat invites applications from qualified professionals with a strong commitment to teaching and research to apply for faculty positions joining January 2018 Lecturer of Health and Safety Oman Occupational Health Management and Organizational Physical Security Health Safety and Environment Applicants Must have a minimum of a relevant Master degree in the content area or closely related field from an accredited institution Minimum of 2-5 years of teaching experience at College University level Preference will be given to Ph D holders with a track record in teaching and research Technical and Industrial experience will count Interested candidates should submit their curriculum vitae and a statement of their research and teaching interests Remuneration & Benefits Competitive package depending on qualification and experience Very competitive salary Paid social and health insurance 45 to 55 days of annual vacation Paid transportation costs return airline ticket once a year Support for family members to get a visa Long term employment opportunities if desired Promotion opportunities

html2.81761: Monter operater u autoindustriji Mesto rada Kopřivnice Češka Republika Neto plata preko 16.000 CZK Radite kao monter auto sedišta na Moravi reka Morava za poznatog proizvođača automobila Mogućnost rada u atraktivnom modernom i čistom radnom okruženju uz mnoge bonuse Mogućnost da se zaradi čak 21500 CZK bruto pored toga prevoz i smeštaj su besplatni Posao je pogodan za kandidate koji su upoznati sa benefitima rada u nemačkoj kompaniji a žele da izrađuju komponente za lidere u automobilskoj industriji Radite na Moravi oko 40 km od Ostrave i stičite iskustvo u već prepoznatljivoj kompaniji Opis posla montiranje metalnih konstrukcija sedišta za automobile kontrola kvaliteta gotovih proizvoda ručna kontrola pridržavanje pravila koja se tiču bezbednosti i zdravlja na radu i protivpožarne zaštite pakovanje gotovih proizvoda u skladu sa važećim propisima pakovanja prijava štete koja se desila u radnom okruženju Koga tražimo kandidate koji žele da steknu iskustvo u međunarodnoj automobilskoj industriji i da pri tome rade u kompaniji sa najpoznatijim brendovima ljude koji žele da odu u Češku da rade i da budu pravedno nagrađeni prethodno iskustvo u automobilskoj proizvodnji je prednost ali ne i uslov Šta ćete dobiti od nas atraktivnu zaradu od 21.500 CZK bruto mogućnost prekovremenog rada a možete dobiti i bonuse u sledećim vrednostima npr dodatak 100% praznik 40% víkend prevoz do Češke i do posla besplatno besplatan smeštaj doplata za ishranu doplata za čišćenje odeće mogućnost kreiranja i napredovanja u karijeri mogućnost akontacije u visini od 1000 CZK neto 13 i 14 plata koja se plaća 2 puta godišnje dodatan bonus u odnosu na ostvaren profit kompanije u zavisnosti od odrađenih meseci u kalendarskoj godini oko 7000 CZK nagrada za otkrivanje nedostataka ili predloga za unapređenje proizvodnje posao u čistom okruženju u modernoj i klimatizovanoj proizvodnoj hali Pažnja broj mesta je ograničen ne oklevajte i kontaktirajte nas još danas

html2.89948: #GDPR-company#je osnovan kao privatni investicioni fond nekoliko porodičnih kancelarija diplomaca sa Univerziteta u Kembridžu #GDPR-company#deluje globalno iz dve kancelarije u Kembridžu Velika Britanija i u Los Altosu Kalifornija SAD #GDPR-company#se bavi investicijama u nekretnine i nove tehnološke kompanije Fond je u delimičnom vlasništvu porodice srpskog porekla U potrazi smo za Koordinator građevinskih radova Rad u Kaliforniji SAD Zahtevi Pozicija sa punim radnim vremenom za kandidate sa srpskog slovačkog rusinskog mađarskog i engleskog govornog podrujča U potrazi smo za istrajnim brzim i sposobnim kandidatom sa odličnim poznavanjem kompjutera i interneta sa ambicijama da se razvija i radi u oblasti industrije nekretnina Kandidat treba da ima odlično znanje engleskog jezika Poželjno je da ima radno iskustvo u inostranstvu ili u međunarodnom random okruženju gde je glavni radni jezik engleski Kandidat mora biti vredan snalažljiv motivisan i preduzimljiv Zainteresovan da radi u Sjedinjenim Američkim Državama i šire Rad će se obavljati uglavnom u području San Fransisko zaliva Kao uslov za ovaj angažman se postavlja mogućnost i spremnost kandidata da se obaveže na rad u Kaliforniji tokom dužeg perioda Opis posla Opšte i tehničko znanje procesa izgradnje i saniranja renovacije domova je neophodno za obavljanje posla a u to spada moleraj postavljanje krovova gipsanih ploča suva gradnja električnih instalacija vodoinstalacija stolarije Radno iskustvo u ovim oblastima je prednost Kandidat mora posedovati vozačku dozvolu Kandidat takođe mora imati odlične komunikacione i organizacione veštine kao i odlične veštine planiranja Od kandidata se očekuje da ima dobar timski duh da uspešno koordiniše građevinske projekte i aktivnosti na njima da vodi i koordiniše velike i male grupe ljudi da komunicira sa saradnicima da upravlja i vodi brigu o narudžbi i zalihama materijala i alata na gradilištima i da vodi računa o budžetu Rad će se obavljati u kancelariji i na terenu Razgovori sa kandidatima će se obaviti putem interneta i lično u Srbiji Termin razgovora može biti fleksibilan Sprovodiće se internet testovi kandidata Da biste aplicirali pošaljite Vaš CV najkasnije do Samo kandidati koji uđu u užu krug će biti kontaktirani #GDPR-company#is established as a privately held global investment vehicle of a number of family offices of Alumni of University of Cambridge #GDPR-company#is operating globally from two offices in Cambridge United Kingdom and in Los Altos California USA #GDPR-company#is an Investment Vehicle of a Family Office from Los Altos California #GDPR-company#is investing in real-estate properties and new technology companies The Family Office is partially owned by a family of Serbian descents We are looking for Construction Coordinator Work in California USA Requirements The Office is looking for a full-time position available for a Serbian Slovak Ruthenian Hungarian and English speaking candidates We are looking for a persistent quick witty computer & internet savvy person with the ambition and strong passion to learn and work in real-estate industry Candidate should have a good command of English language and preferably some experience working in English speaking country or in an international environment where English was used as a working language You are a hardworking resourceful ambitious and entrepreneurial person with an ambition to develop career in the United States and globally The work will be performed mainly in San Francisco Bay Area Candidates commitment to stay in California for extended period of time is a condition for this engagement Job Description Technical and general knowledge of home repair and construction is a must i e painting roofing drywall electricity plumbing and carpentry projects Work experience and actual skills in those areas of construction would give you an advantage However you must have a driver's license display excellent communication organizational and planning skills You will be expected to work in a team setting coordinate construction projects and scheduling lead and coordinate large and small groups of people communicate with associates manage the site's tool and construction material stock orders and budgets The work is both in and outside of the office Interviews in English will be conducted both online and in person Interview dates can be flexible Internet tests will be conducted To apply please send your CV and application letter no later than Apply now Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted

html2.91789: Arbeitsmigration und Projektmanagement Schiel Unser Geschäftspartnerin Baden-Württemberg Villa Rosenstein GmbH suchtfürseineauf Demenz spezialisierte Pflegeeinrichtung Pflegefachkräfte m w IhrProfil Sie bringen mindestens eine erfolgreich abgeschlossene vierjährige Ausbildung als Krankenpfleger m w inklusive abgeschlossenem Fachpraktikum Fachprüfung mit medicinska sestra tehničar opšti smer uključujući stručni državni ispit Sie sind motiviert und haben ein ausgeprägtes Interesse am Pflegeberuf Sie zeichnen sich durch eine hohe pflegerische und soziale Kompetenz aus und sind den Umgang mit älteren Menschen gewöhnt Ihre Deutschkenntnisse entsprechen mindestens B1 Niveau Bevorzugt haben Sie schon Arbeitserfahrungen gesammelt aber auch als Berufseinsteiger haben Sie die Möglichkeit nach einer sorgfältigen Einarbeitung weitere Erfahrungen zu sammeln Was wir Ihnen bieten Einen unbefristeten Arbeitsvertrag direkt bei unserem Geschäftspartner Villa Rosenstein in Baden- Württemberg nach Anerkennung Gehalt gemäß deutschen Standards Zuschläge für Nacht- Wochenend- und Feiertagsdienste Begleitung während des Prozesses zur Anerkennung der Berufsausbildung in Deutschland Nostrifikation Unterstützung bei der Antragstellung auf Visum Wohnungssuche sowie Anreise Mehr Einzelheiten verraten wir gerne in einem persönlichen Gespräch Haben wir Ihr Interesse geweckt Dann freuen wir uns über Ihren tabellarischen Lebenslauf Wir freuen uns auf Sie

radio-relejnih pristupnih mreža Vremenom je kompanija razvila kompetencije i u drugim segmentima telco poslovanja tako da danas poseduje veliko iskustvo i značajnu prisutnost u regionu razvijajudi tri strateške linije poslovanja radio i radio-relejne pristupne mreže pasivne optičke mreže i transportne i pristupne sisteme Zbog proširenja obima posla na teritoriji Bosne i Hercegovine kompanija Praćenje performansi i kvaliteta rada u okviru sektora za tehniku i izveštavanje višeg menadžmenta Implementacija jasno definisane organizacione strukture i svih pozicija u dodeljenom sektoru u cilju html2.118597: Naša kompanija je jedna od vodećih transportnih firmi u Nemačkoj deo velikog Hoyern Koznern sistema koji zapošljava preko 5.000 ljudi Osnovna delatnost je prevoz tehničkih gasova na teritoriji Nemačke Republike Sva naša vozila ispunjavaju propisane standarde kvaliteta i bezbednosti Bezbednost naših vozača i vozila i briga o njima je na najvišem mogućem nivou i u vrhu našeg poslovanja WIMMER TRANSPORTDIENST GmbHraspisuje konkurs za radno mesto VOZAČ TEŠKIH KAMIONA BRD Potreban broj izvršilaca 5 Zasnivanje stalnog radnog odnosa na neodređeno vreme Uslovi koji su potrebni da kandidat ispunjava Dozvola za upravljanje vozilima teškim kamionima do 40t za prevoz posebnog tereta Najmanje tri godine radnog iskustva na datom radnom mestu Poželjno posedovanje ADR dozvole za transport opasnog tereta Poželjno je da kandidat pre dolaska u Nemačku ima položen A2 kurs Nemačkog jezika Privremeno preseljenje na neodređeni vremenski period u Nemačku i dalje usavršavanje Nemačkog jezika Da kandidati poseduju državljanstvo sledećih zemalja Mađarska Hrvatska Slovenija Slovačka Rumunija Bugarska Ukoliko kandidati ne ispunjavaju ovaj uslov njihove aplikacije biće automatski odbijene Šta potencijalni radnik može da očekuje Obuka za rad na vozilu za prevoz gasa i opasnih tereta Odličan lični dohodak Plaćen stan Profesionalni kurs usavršavanja nemačkog jezika Svaka vrsta pomoći pri adaptiranju na život u Nemačkoj uz pružanje objašnjenja na srpskom jeziku Uz konkursnu prijavu potrebno je da priložite i sledeće Vaš CV i kratku biografiju Fotokopiju vozačke dozvole Fotokopiju ADR dozvole Fotokopija pasoša koji dokazuje da ste državljanin EU Fotokopiju lične karte ili primerak učitane lične karte ukolik je sa čipom Fotokopija lekarskog uverenja kojim se potrvrđuje da ste kvalifikovani za traženi posao WIMMER TRANSPORTDIENST GmbH Laufenauerstr 6-8 D-83352 Altenmarkt www.generic.com www.generic.com Vaše biografije i podatke možete dostaviti elektronski na srpskom jeziku

html2.120243: #GDPR-company#is looking for Chief Operating Officer Requirements #GDPR-company#is looking for COO having 15 years experience in Coal Fire Power Project Degree in Engineering Language Fluent in English Skilled in organizational development personnel management budget and resource development and strategic planning Excellent people skills with an ability to partner with a dynamic leadership team Mission The Chief Operating Officer position provides the leadership management and vision necessary to ensure that the Company has the proper operational controls administrative and reporting procedures and people systems in place to effectively grow the organization and to ensure financial strength and operating efficiency The position accomplishes this through a respectful constructive and energetic style guided by the objectives of the Company The COO will implement operations guidelines Health and Safety governance standards policies procedures reporting tools and initiatives emanating from the shareholders or agreed with them Reporting Line & Management Duties The COO shall be reporting to the CEO The position has 2 direct reports comprising Project Manager and project management team during construction phase Plant GM along with operation and maintenance teams Objectives and Main Duties The COO will meet the following objectives PRE FINANCIAL CLOSE AND CONSTRUCTION PHASES Be the point of contact for the Owner's Engineers Ensure the power plant construction is achieved without any cost and time overruns Ensure that the EPC Contractor performance is consistent with the requirement set forth in the EPC Contract Ensure that the Commissioning and Testing of the plant is done according to the highest level of engineering standards and industry practices Closely monitor the power plant construction pre-empt the issues and take corrective actions well in advance OPERATIONS PHASE Provide guidance to the operations teams and ensure that the operations and maintenance of the power plant is achieved in the most effective manner to maximise the profits without compromising on the quality and safety standards Provide day-to-day leadership and management to a service organization that mirrors the adopted mission and core values of the Company Motivate and lead a high performance management team attract recruit and retain required members of the executive team not currently in place Perform any other tasks required from time to time to manage the Company or as directed by the Board of Directors Achieve a safe place to work and safe systems of work through the demonstration of safe work behaviours Compensations #GDPR-company#is offering market competitive salary exceeding US 15000 along with this the selected candidate will be provided Accommodation Car Insurance & 3 Return Air Tickets Karachi Belgrade Karachi

html2.132439: Resort Representatives based in Kotor Tivat Budva Montenegro for a UK Travel Company Explore Montenegro is the largest UK holiday company in Montenegro offering villa apartment holidays and specialist tours See our website www.generic.com for more information We are looking for personable enthusiastic and well-organized holiday Representatives to ensure our guests have the best possible experience during their stay with us in Montenegro We are looking for three Representatives to be based in Kotor Tivat and Budva Key responsibilities include Welcoming guests at the airport and at their accommodation Resolving any guest issues or complaints Selling excursions to our guests Inspecting accommodation before arrivals and after departure Liaising with property owners and cleaners to make sure accommodation is maintained to an appropriate standard Reporting any health and safety issues We are looking for individuals with the following attributes Excellent spoken English plus fluent in Montenegrin Full driving licence and confident driving in Montenegro Excellent customer service attitude Good knowledge of Montenegrin coast Excellent communication and organization skills Ability to work independently and use initiative to resolve any issues Please apply in English with your CV and a covering letter outlining the skills you believe you could bring to this position Deadline for applications

html2.134710: CONFIDA is an international tax advising consulting and auditing company with offices in Austria and numerous South-East European countries In an increasingly globalized economy we advise clients from all areas of business Our work is characterized by the best heads principle by combining international experience and local know-how our clients obtain optimal answers to all their questions For the purpose of business expansion we are announcing the following vacant position AUDIT SENIOR Banja Luka Job Description The commercial world has never been more fiercely regulated than it is today With the publicized ruin of several global companies over the last few years and the resultant introduction of new compliance regulations like Sarbanes-Oxley the role of the corporate auditor is now more important than ever To enable us to support our significant growth we are seeking talented and experienced audit professionals who have an eye for detail can think outside the box and who have a passion for their profession More specifically you will need to demonstrate that you are able perform the following responsibilities Specific Responsibilities To be able work effectively in a team to plan manage and execute audit engagements within a risk based environment efficiently and effectively To be #GDPR-company#Financial Reporting Standards literate To be sufficiently flexible to work cross border between the countries on audit engagements and where appropriate to be able to effectively work in cross functional teams for example consulting financial advisory services in different countries where your skills and industry experience are most appropriate To be able to develop effective business relationships with clients in order to identify package and sell business solutions that help our clients grow and become more successful To demonstrate an ability to be innovative in creating potential new service lines for assurance and to work with the wider team to implement your ideas To be a role model and mentor for less experienced members of the team providing on the job training and to be able to develop young talented team members Requirements Professional Certification undergraduate or master's degree 3 years of experience minimum Demonstrated up to date knowledge of accounting standards Serbian GAAP and IFRS Demonstrated entrepreneurial flair drive and sales ability Excellent oral and written communications English language IT skills such as advanced use of MS Word Excel and PowerPoint packages are required Demonstrate the ability to influence change and shape the direction of a particular activity either internally and or externally Contribute to effective team work in internal engagement situations External audit experience gained within a professional services firm Prior Big 4 Audit experience preferred The Firm lives by a set of shared values encapsulated by its Value Statement which guides the actions and behaviours of each of its professionals The values influence the way staff and partners interact with each other as well as the way they serve clients and engage with all their stakeholders The values require People who demonstrate integrity respect and teaming People who are open inclusive and have fun People who build relationships based on doing the right thing If you have the qualifications and attitude and you're ready for a career with a dynamic organization in an environment that fosters professional development and accelerated career advancement potential cross border cross functions we look forward to hearing from you All CV's will be reviewed but only shortlisted candidates will be contacted Contact Interested candidates should send a cover letter electronically or to the address #GDPR-company#d o o Confida Revizija d o o Knez Mihailova #GDPR# Beograd Deadline for application CONFIDA je internacionalna grupa koja se bavi knjigovodstvom poreskim savetovanjem i revizijom sa kancelarijama u zemljama jugoistočne Evrope Na tržištima sve prisutnije globalizacije pružamo usluge savetovanja klijentima iz svih poslovnih oblasti Naše poslovanje se zasniva na pricipu najboljih umova kombinovanjem međunarodnog iskustva i lokalnog khow-how-a pružajući našim klijentima odgovore na sva njihova pitanja Zbog proširenja obima posla raspisujemo konkurs za SENIOR REVIZOR Banja Luka Opis poslova Privredno okruženje nikada do sad nije imalo tako strogu regulativu kao što je to slučaj danas Po objavi propasti nekoliko svetskih kompanija u proteklih nekoliko godina što je za posledicu imalo uvođenje novih propisa tipa Sarbanes-Oxley uloga korporativnog revizora je u ovom trenutku važnija no ikada pre Da bismo podržali značajan rast koji beležimo tražimo talentovane iskusne i profesionalne revizore koji imaju oko za detalje koji imaju šire sagledavanje stvari i koji posvećeno obavljaju svoj posao Konkretno moraćete da pokažete da ste sposobni da obavljate sledeće Posebne odgovornosti Sposobnost uspešnog rada u timu kod planiranja upravljanja i izvršavanja revizorskih angažmana u rizičnom okruženju uspešno i delotvorno Poznavanje Međunarodnih standarda finansijskog izveštavanja Potrebna fleksibilnost za prekogranični rad između zemalja na revizorskim angažmanima a po potrebi sposobnost uspešnog rada u inter-funkcionalnim poslovnih odnosa sa klijentima u cilju identifikacije uobličavanja i prodaje poslovnih rešenja kao pomoć našim klijentima u razvoju i većoj uspešnosti Sposobnost inovacija u kreiranju potencijalnih novih programa usluga u cilju obezbeđenja kao i rada u većim timovima u cilju sprovođenja sopstvenih ideja Model i uzor manje iskusnim članovima tima pružajući obuku na licu mesta i sposobnost razvoja
